author: rdonkin
msg: Revise packaging to allow space for user subscription

author: rdonkin
msg: Split authentication (which will usually be delegated to a container) from subscription management (which is particular requirements related to IMAP). Aim to add JPA support for subscription (but not authentication) persistence.
